Header: George Bush Senior dies at the age of 94
Content: Former US President George HW Bush has died at the age of 94, his son George W Bush has announced.George Bush Sr, as he was known, passed away on Friday evening, a statement said on behalf of the family.He was a World War Two aviator and Texan oil tycoon before entering politics in 1964 as a Republican.In April, he was admitted to a hospital intensive care unit with an infection, a week after the death of his wife Barbara.
